application.ref: GROBID - A machine learning software for extracting information from scholarly documents

titleStmt.title: Intrinsic Dimension Estimation Using Packing Numbers

affiliation.orgName: Operations Research University of Montreal CP 6128 succ. Centre-Ville

analytic.title: Intrinsic Dimension Estimation Using Packing Numbers

abstract.p: We propose a new algorithm to estimate the intrinsic dimension of data sets. The method is based on geometric properties of the data and requires neither parametric assumptions on the data generating model nor input parameters to set. The method is compared to a similar, widely-used algorithm from the same family of geometric techniques. Experiments show that our method is more robust in terms of the data generating distribution and more reliable in the presence of noise.
